title: The University of Colorado System Massive Open Online Course Discretionary Fund
description: To support all aspects of the University of Colorado System MOOC Initiative, including course and specialization design and development, marketing, and evaluation, under the direction of the Associate Vice President for Digital Education and Engagement
marketingContent: To support all aspects of the University of Colorado System MOOC Initiative, including course and specialization design and development, marketing, and evaluation, under the direction of the Associate Vice President for Digital Education and Engagement.
